DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to investigate the efficacy and safety of HC-58 in patients with severe upper limb hemiplegia following stroke.
DOC.brief_title: Study of HC-58 in Upper Limb Hemiplegic Patients After Stroke
DOC.criteria: Patients with severe upper limb hemiplegia after stroke Within 28 days after stroke at enrollment Patients with sensory loss between shoulder and hand on paralyzed side Patients with pain between shoulder and hand on paralysed side which affects medical rehabilitation
